GLOBAL.title: General Filling Instructions
GLOBAL.instruction: The form must be filled in BLACK ink and in CAPITAL LETTERS. All fields marked with an asterisk (*) are mandatory.
rejections: Form not filled in capital letters
Form not filled using black ink

CUST_INFO_1.title: Primary Applicant Name & ID
CUST_INFO_1.instruction: Write the full name and Customer ID of the first account holder.

CUST_INFO_2.title: Second Applicant Name & ID
CUST_INFO_2.instruction: If opening a joint FD, write the second person's name and Customer ID here.
rejections: Name present but Customer ID missing

CUST_INFO_3.title: Third Applicant Name & ID
CUST_INFO_3.instruction: If there is a third joint holder, write their details here.

ENTITY_DETAILS.title: Entity Details (Non-Individuals Only)
ENTITY_DETAILS.instruction: If this deposit is for a business or organization, write the Entity's Customer ID and the specific Account Title you want on the FD.
rejections: Entity details filled for individual applicant

DEBIT_ACC_NO.title: Account Number to Debit
DEBIT_ACC_NO.instruction: Enter the IDFC FIRST Bank account number from which the money should be taken to book this deposit.

DEBIT_SIGNATURES.title: Debit Account Signatures
DEBIT_SIGNATURES.instruction: All holders of the debit account must sign here exactly as per their original account opening form.

DEPOSIT_TYPE_SELECT.title: Deposit Type Selection (Regular vs. Green)
DEPOSIT_TYPE_SELECT.instruction:
Choose ONE: 
1. 'Regular Deposit': Standard FD with flexible renewal options.
2. 'Green Deposit': Your money is used for eco-friendly projects (Green Finance). Note: Green Deposits have a fixed tenure and CANNOT be auto-renewed (they close automatically on maturity).

REG_FD_AMOUNT.title: Regular FD Amount
REG_FD_AMOUNT.instruction: If you chose Regular Deposit, write the amount you want to invest here.
rejections: Amount missing when Regular FD selected

REG_FD_TENURE.title: Regular FD Tenure
REG_FD_TENURE.instruction:
Write how long you want to keep the deposit (Years, Months, and Days). 
Note: If you select 'Tax Saver', the tenure MUST be exactly 5 years (lock-in period).
rejections: Tax Saver selected but tenure is not 5 years

REG_FD_INTEREST_PAYOUT.title: Regular FD Interest Payout
REG_FD_INTEREST_PAYOUT.instruction: Select how you want to receive interest: 'Cumulative' (paid at end) or 'Non-Cumulative' (paid Monthly/Quarterly).
rejections: Payout frequency not selected for Non-Cumulative FD

REG_FD_CATEGORY.title: Regular FD Category
REG_FD_CATEGORY.instruction: Tick the category: 'Standard', 'Senior Citizen', or 'Tax Saver'.

GREEN_FD_DETAILS.title: Green Deposit Details
GREEN_FD_DETAILS.instruction:
Fill this ONLY if you selected 'Green Deposit'. 
Constraints: 
1. Minimum amount is ₹5,000.
2. Maximum amount is ₹13 Crores.
3. Maturity instruction is 'Auto Closure' only (cannot renew).
rejections: Filled while Regular FD is selected

MATURITY_INSTRUCTIONS.title: Maturity Instructions
MATURITY_INSTRUCTIONS.instruction:
Tell the bank what to do when the FD expires: 'Renew Principal & Interest', 'Renew Principal only', or 'Payout everything'. 
(Note: If you chose Green Deposit, you MUST choose 'Payout/Auto Closure').
rejections: Renewal selected for Green Deposit (Not allowed)

RD_DETAILS.title: Recurring Deposit (RD) Details
RD_DETAILS.instruction: Fill this ONLY if you want to start an RD. Enter the Monthly Installment Amount and select the Tenure (e.g., 12 months).

MODE_OF_OPERATION.title: Mode of Operation
MODE_OF_OPERATION.instruction: Tick how the account will be operated (e.g., 'Singly', 'Either or Survivor', 'Jointly').

TDS_OPTION.title: TDS (Tax) Preference
TDS_OPTION.instruction: Select if you want tax deducted (TDS). If you are exempt, tick the box for 'Form 15G/15H' or 'Exempt' category.

NOMINEE_NAME.title: Nominee Name
NOMINEE_NAME.instruction: Write the name of the person who should receive the money in case of death. (Leave blank if you do not want to add a nominee).

NOMINEE_RELATION.title: Nominee Relationship & DOB
NOMINEE_RELATION.instruction: Write the nominee's relationship to you (e.g., Spouse, Father) and their Date of Birth.
rejections: Relationship missing when name is provided

NOMINEE_MINOR_GUARD.title: Guardian for Minor Nominee
NOMINEE_MINOR_GUARD.instruction: If the nominee is under 18 (minor), you MUST provide the name and address of an adult Guardian.
rejections: Nominee is minor but Guardian details missing

FINAL_DECLARATION.title: Final Declaration Signatures
FINAL_DECLARATION.instruction: All applicants must sign at the bottom of the form to accept the terms and conditions.
rejections: Witness signature missing (if thumb impression used)

BANK_USE_ONLY.title: For Bank Use Only
BANK_USE_ONLY.instruction: This section is to be completed by bank officials only, including product codes, branch codes, and campaign details.
